Heroes.Name: Lord Ach-Thok-Gran
Heroes.History: The brother to King Kud-Loh-Kan, Ach-Thok-Gran is cold-hearted and violent, even for a Corrupted. He wishes nothing more than to spread the Corruption into his brother's kingdom, so that he will be strong enough to conquer the rest of Hyrule. The evil power that the Corrupted suffer under has affected him to the core, turning this once-carefree Scrub into one of the most heartless creatures in all of Hyrule. He cares nothing for the subjects he enslaves, seeing them as stepping-stones to that exist only to further his own power.

Heroes.Name: War Leader Wech-Grok-Thurg
Heroes.History: War leader of the Corrupted hordes, Wech-Grok-Thurg gained his position in the only way the Corrupted know how: by killing the former War Leader in single combat. Though undeniably the ugliest and strongest of the Corrupted, he is still intelligant enough to plan battles, even if they ususally amount to 'You hit them here, I'll hit them there'.

Heroes.Name: Butler Kuh-Do
Heroes.History: A personal servant of King Kuh-Loh-Kan and manager of all things money, Butler Kuh-Do is quiet and out of the spotlight, but clearly has vast power over Scrub kind. His hands seem to be tied to the Scrubs' growing markets across Hyrule, and he maintains his own force of tax collectors and bullies to insure that the royal coffers... and his personal bank account... are flowing with Rupees.

Heroes.Name: Titan: Odwala, Armored Colossus
Heroes.History: This giant hulking Orhat Beetle has long lurked on the eastern forests of Hyrule. In some cases the Scrubs have been known to coerce this huge monster into fighting on their behalf. Stagnox may be slow, but his armor is some of the most impressive and durable in Hyrule. While the Stagnox has wings, his huge size makes his ability to fly very limited.

TeamBonuses.Name: Partner Networks
TeamBonuses.History: The Deku Scrubs have created a massive network of merchants and salesmen, and will share their secrets with their allies.

Structures.Name: Wonder: Wooded Temple
Structures.History: A large and ancient Temple in the Picorou Woods. The Scrubs claim to have build it in ages past, but despite their iconagraphy carved into it's stone the design has little resemblence to their civilization. The massive temple is home to many Orhat Beetle nests and the structure seems to have sunken into the ground since its construction.
